column4: "me; and Shagga and Conn for the Stone Crows; Ulf for the Moon Brothers; and Timett"
"me; and Shagga and Conn for the Stone Crows; Ulf for the Moon Brothers; and Timett"
"sellsword had tugged at his crotch ï¿½ but even Bronn kept a respectful tongue around Timett"
"announced Timett son of Timett; who had yet to see his twentieth year.  Ser Kevan"
"here Timett son of Timett; a red hand of the Burned Men. And this is Bronn"
"strongholds; my lords?"  "Horses;" said Shagga.  "A promise of silk and steel;" said Timett"
"said Shagga.  "A promise of silk and steel;" said Timett son of Timett.  Tyrion"
"them."  Oh; deftly done; Tyrion thought; smiling crookedly.  "The Burned Men fear nothing. Timett"
"they were yanking arrows out of Shagga; and showed them four ears she had taken. Timett"
"women; they may take what they want and burn the rest."  "Telling Shagga and Timett"
""Telling Shagga and Timett how to pillage is like telling a rooster how to crow;" Tyrion"
